p: Minimum inhibitory concentration (MIC) was determined for all EOs and mixtures with the broth microdilution method, starting from a dilution of 10% ( v/ v) and following the guidelines of CLSI [ 14] and a protocol previously reported [ 12]. All tests were performed in triplicate. The MIC value was determined as the lowest concentration, expressed in mg/mL, of each EO and mixture at which bacteria show no visible growth.
